title: 2024-DC SWOT denoising OSE
text: A challenge CNES on removing the uncorrelated KaRIN instrumental noise from the SWOT data.
author: Datlas, CLS and IMEDEA

title: 2024-DC 4DMedSea ESA mapping OSE
text: A challenge ESA - 4DMedSea project to provide SSH products in the Mediterranean for 4D reconstructions.
author: Datlas and CLS

title: 2024-DC WOC currents mapping OSE
text: A challenge ESA - World Ocean Current project to compare currents mapped products using various data types.
author: Datlas

title: 2023 OSSE SSC NATL60 GF
text: A challenge on inversion of sea surface currents from satellite-derived SST-SSH synergies.
author: IMT-Atlantique and CLS

title: 2023-DC global altimetry mapping OSE
text: A challenge on real conventional nadir mapping at global scales and in regional zooms.
author: Datlas and CLS

title: 2023-DC SSH HF mapping in California OSSE
text: A challenge on mapping high frequency SSH with artificial SWOT and nadir data in the Californian SWOT Xover.
author: Datlas and MEOM

title: 2023-DC SSH mapping in the Western Med Sea OSE
text: A challenge on mapping real conventional altimetric data in the Western Mediterranean Sea.
author: Datlas and MEOM

title: 2022-DC SWOT error calibration Gulf Stream
text: A challenge on the SWOT satellite spatially correlated error calibration in the Gulf Stream region.
author: Datlas, CLS, IMT-Atlantique and MEOM

title: 2022-DC Altimetric mapping on a QG model
text: A challenge on mapping pseudo altimetric data on a quasi-geostrophic model for educational purposes.
author: Datlas and MEOM

title: 2022-DC SWOT karin error filtering North Atlantic
text: A challenge on the SWOT Karin instrumental error filtering in the North-Atlantic basin.
author: Datlas and CLS

title: 2021-DC SSH Mapping in the Gulf Stream OSE
text: The goal is to investigate how to best reconstruct sequences of SSH maps from real nadir satellite altimetry observations.
author: MEOM and CLS

title: 2020-DC SSH Mapping in the Gulf Stream OSSE
text: The goal is to investigate how to best reconstruct sequences of Sea Surface Height (SSH) maps artificial nadir and SWOT satellite altimetry observations.
author: MEOM and CLS
